name: Yokozuna
text:
Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
When Attacking DON!!:1: Return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less to its owner's hand.

effect.text: After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.
Return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less to its owner's hand.

meta.notes: Rarity is 'C' as printed in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the 'SAMPLE' watermark.
